description: Lelouch`s younger brother and also a student at Ashford Private Academy. However, that is his fake identity. He is actually an assassin who was hired by the Intelligence Service to watch over Lelouch. But he was won over by Lelouch because he felt that Lelouch understood his complicated origins as an assassin. He has the Geass power that stops time.
name: Rolo Lamperouge
